transcript:
Sanjay ko call karne ke liye dhanyavad.
Hello.
Hello.
Hello. Haan.
Ji Sanjay ji baat kar rahe hain advance technology se?
Mahoday.
Hai sir, main Rishabh baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Good afternoon.
Ji sir, main abhi bahut busy hun, abhi baat nahi kar payenge.
Achha, kya baat hai thoda batayenge?
Sir, aap actually kal customer care pe call kar rahe the IndiaMART ke, aapka ek mail bhi aaya tha.
Ki Delhi se call aa raha hai sir.
To usi ke liye maine call kiya tha sir. Kya hua main batata hun aapko.
Ji.
Aa, kal dopahar mein.
Hmm.
Delhi se bol raha hai ki Delhi se maine phone kara hun.
To unhone phone karke bola ki aapka naam se koi loan liya hai, aapko payment karna padega.
Matlab hum to kisi ko permit diya nahi loan lene ke liye, to main kyunki bhi nahi aapko dena padega aise aise rahe ja raha tha.
To IndiaMART se hi call aa raha tha hamare paas. Direct number IndiaMART se.
IndiaMART buyer ke naam se call aaya tha aapke paas?
Han han thik thik hai.
Sir agar aisa kuch aa raha hai call aapke paas, usko aap hash one daba denge na call ke beech mein jaise aapka mera call chal raha hai. Is call ke beech mein agar hash one daba doge aap, to wo number aapke end se block ho jayega. Fir wo dobara call nahi kar payenge aapko us number se.
Achha achha.
Samajh samajh gaya baat. Jo bhi spam calls hoti hain, usko hash one daba do. Do do call do bar aaya do alag alag number se aaya.
Main samajh sakta hun sir. Dekho portal open hai sir, koi bhi call kar sakta hai sir, hum bhi samajhte hain wo. But us case mein humne ek option diya hua hai hash one dabane ka. Hash one daba ke wo number block ho jayega. Fir agar usko call karna hoga kisi aur number se karega. To hame har bar wo initially to hash one dabana padega. Usko buyer ko call karne se nahi rok payenge hum bhi, aap bhi samajhte hain sir. Kyunki buyer koi genuine hai, non genuine hai, ye hum bina call kiye ya bina wo recording sune nahi pata laga payenge.
Hmm hmm samajh gaya baat thik hai.
Na. To aap hash one daba dena aage se waise call jitne bhi aaye sir.
Iske alawa aur koi dikkat pareshani jo IndiaMART mein face ho raha ho sir?
Nahi nahi nahi.
To concern sir ye jo tha ye main close kar du apne end se?
Han sir kar dijiye thik.
Thik hai sir. Aap busy the abhi isliye main pura discussion nahi kar raha hun sir. Ek mere ko aap Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday jab bhi aapke paas samay ho ek thoda sa time de dena taki catalog par bhi aapke kam ho sake aur call wagera hum yahan se jo buyer call buyer inquiry hai usko badha sake sir. Han.
Thik thik thik hai. Main aapko Tuesday call karu sir, chalega?
Aa thik hai sir, main baat kar lunga.
Thik hai sir. Thank you so much sir. Have a great day ahead sir. Thank you. Han thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Received loan-related spam calls using IndiaMART name.

- Wants to block spam calls.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to block numbers.

- Offered to discuss catalog and increase inquiries.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back on Tuesday.



Alert (If Any):

spam calls

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- spam calls, block number, buyleads, catalog
